definition: a form of punishment in which a person is forced to run between two lines of men facing each other and armed with clubs or whips to beat the victim
details:
noun
- a form of punishment in which a person is forced to run between two lines of men facing each other and armed with clubs or whips to beat the victim
= synonyms: gantlet
- a glove with long sleeve
= synonyms: gantlet
- a glove of armored leather
= synonyms: gantlet, metal glove
- to offer or accept a challenge
= example: to offer or accept a challenge
= synonyms: gantlet
